channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 12:41 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 12:41 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 12:01 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsky rayon-Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol territorial community
item.description: 游리 12:01 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Novomoskovsky rayon-Pavlograd district-Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
